lead_paragraph: Test your punctuation skills with today's question, created by Danielle Hoagland and Judith McCaffrey at Grammarlogues from the Times article "U.S. to Send Visual Artists as Cultural Ambassadors."
snippet: We have capitalized one too many words in the first sentence of a Times article. Which one is it?
abstract: We have capitalized one too many words in the first sentence of a Times article. Which one is it?
